programme.title: Em uma missão para localizar Trish na Sardenha a pedido do chefe, o leal subordinado Doppio encontra o traidor Risotto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Uma historinha do passado – "Meu Nome é Doppio"

programme.title: Ao perceber que Doppio é mais do que um simples membro de Passione, Risotto o ataca sistematicamente com a habilidade magnética de seu Stand, Metallic.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Garoto de Ouro, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um garoto bem-humorado descobre um par de calças mágicas que podem tirar uma quantidade infinita de notas dos bolsos. Ele logo é perseguido por forças poderosas que não querem nada mais do que controlar o fluxo de dinheiro.

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.title: Em Nome do Rei: A Última Missão, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um assassino moderno, é contratado para uma tarefa final: sequestrar as filhas de uma Família real européia. As coisas vão à loucura quando descobrimos que ele escolheu voltar à Idade Média e trazer de volta a ordem a um reino no caos.

programme.title: A jornada mágica de Emily, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Depois da morte de seu pai, a pequena Emily tenta ajudar sua mãe a reencontrar a felicidade e aprender sobre o pai que nunca conheceu.

programme.title: D Artagnan O Quarto Mosqueteiro, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A mando de seu pai, o jovem d’Artagnan viaja da Gasconha rural para Paris, onde se envolve em uma trama desonesta entre os mosqueteiros do rei e os guardas do cardeal Richelieu.

programme.title: O Medalhão Perdido: Billy Stone e o Medalhão Mágico, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem que parou em um lar adotivo, para deixar algumas doações, conta às crianças uma história sobre dois amigos adolescentes que descobrem um medalhão há muito perdido que os transporta de volta no tempo.

programme.title: Trenk - O Cavaleiro Trapalhão, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Trenk, de dez anos, camponês e propriedade do malvado Sir Wertolt, quer se tornar um cavaleiro e libertar sua família. Depois de muitas aventuras, ele resolve o problema do dragão do ducado e é nomeado cavaleiro pelo duque.

programme.title: O Doador de Memórias, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A impressionante história de Jonas, um jovem que vive num mundo sem cor mas aparentemente perfeito, e de harmoniosa conformidade. No entanto, Jonas começa a passar mais tempo com o Doador, o único guardião de todas as memórias da comunidade.

programme.title: Thor - Caçada ao Ladrão, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Tom treinou o pastor alemão Thor e aprendeu muitas habilidades. Com sua namorada Mirjam, eles têm aventuras emocionantes. Nas férias, a diversão vira enrascada quando a família é confundida com bandidos e precisa provar sua inocência.

programme.title: O Medalhão Perdido: Billy Stone e o Medalhão Mágico, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem que parou em um lar adotivo, para deixar algumas doações, conta às crianças uma história sobre dois amigos adolescentes que descobrem um medalhão há muito perdido que os transporta de volta no tempo.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que está tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do país está em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Liga dos Deuses, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: A história conta como o Rei Zhou de Shang se torna um tirano devido às astúcias de Daji, um espírito vixen que está disfarçado como uma de suas concubinas.

programme.title: Olhos de Dragão, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Hong usa sua visão moral e habilidades para lutar e salvar um bairro de traficantes de drogas e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: The Beast With A Million Eyes, (1955, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An unspeakable horror! Extraterrestrial terror is on the hunt for human flesh in this horrifying tale of invasion! This is a 1950s creature-feature with some serious sociological bite! Paul Birch, Lorna Thayer, and Richard Sargent star!

programme.title: Robinson Crusoe On Mars, (1964, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Stranded on Mars with only a monkey as a companion, an astronaut must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet.

programme.title: Run Silent, Run Deep, (1958, War)
programme.desc: The legendary Clark Gable and Burt Lancaster star in this gripping, classic military drama as a submarine commander (Gable) drives his men and his 1st officer (Lancaster) to the brink of mutiny in his quest to sink an enemy sub. Robert Wise directs.

programme.title: Sayonara, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando stars as an Air Force Major who faces prejudice when he falls in love with a Japanese actress while stationed in Japan. Winner of 4 Academy Awards® including Best Supporting Actor and Actress nods to Red Buttons and Miyoshi Umeki .

programme.title: Shake Hands With the Devil, (1959, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Cagney stars in this action-packed tale of the struggle between the Irish Republican Army and the British Black and Tans, as an Irish-American medical student (Don Murray) takes up arms with the rebellion after losing his best friend!

programme.title: Lilies of the Field, (1963, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Nominated for 5 Academy Awards® including Best Picture and winner of the Best Actor Oscar® for Sidney Poitier for his role as an itinerant handyman who stops to help five impoverished nuns and the small Arizona desert town in which they reside.

programme.title: Paradise, Hawaiian Style, (1966, Musical)
programme.desc: Elvis takes to the skies over the island paradise of Kauai. He’s a partner in a helicopter charter service. Romance, naturally, is in the air for the King…but his business may be grounded.

programme.title: Alfie, (1966, Romance)
programme.desc: Alfie is not really a bad sort. It’s just that he has this overwhelming desire for the opposite sex. You might say that “birds’ are irresistible to him, sort of second nature.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: East-West tensions erupt when the CIA suspects that renegade Russian scientists are developing more nuclear weapons.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan must quickly evolve from soldier to analyst to full-fledged operative to stop a devastating terrorist plot against the United States.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson stars as a Los Angeles policeman who recently lost his wife and has been acting increasingly unstable. Danny Glover plays a homicide detective with an impeccable record and a loving family. Now the two are stuck with each other as partners.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover are back as a volatile pair of LAPD detectives. This time, the cops are unhappy with their assignment to baby-sit an accountant. But the mob wants the accountant dead—and is killing everyone who gets in its way.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Police officers Riggs (Mel Gibson) and Murtaugh (Danny Glover) team for the third time. This time, they must track down a crooked cop who has stolen weapons from the Los Angeles police depot.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 4, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover reteam as a pair of Los Angeles police detectives. Promoted to desk jobs to keep them out of trouble, the two cops join forces with a junior detective and a fast-talking private investigator to unravel a series of crimes.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson stars as a Los Angeles policeman who recently lost his wife and has been acting increasingly unstable. Danny Glover plays a homicide detective with an impeccable record and a loving family. Now the two are stuck with each other as partners.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2, (2003, Horror)

programme.desc: In this edge-of-your-seat supernatural thriller featuring Hollywood's hottest stars, a study in fear escalates into a heart-stopping nightmare for a professor and three subjects trapped in a mysterious mansion.

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (1989, Horror)

programme.title: May, (2003, Horror)

May grew up as a lonely oddball whose only friend was a perfectly kept doll. When she moves to L.A., she takes up with a handsome filmmaker and then an alluring lesbian, but every connection she makes turns out deadly.
Rated R

programme.title: Proof, (2005, Drama)

programme.title: The Mouse Trap, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: It's Alex's 21st Birthday, but she's stuck at the amusement arcade on a late shift so her friends decide to surprise her, but a masked killer dressed as a mouse decides to play a game of his own with them which she must survive.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Horror)

programme.title: Let Me In (2010), (2011, Horror)

programme.title: Bones And All, (2022, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In a world that cannot abide who they truly are, a young woman who is learning how to survive on the margins of society and an intense, disenfranchised drifter embark upon a road trip, searching for identity and chasing beauty in a perilous world.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction, (1987, Crime)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas plays Dan, a New York attorney who has a tryst with seductive Alex Forrest while his wife is away. Dan later shrugs off the affair as a mistake and considers it over. But Alex won't be ignored. Not now, not tomorrow, not ever.

programme.title: Clue, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: Meet all the notorious suspects and discover all their foul play things. You'll love their dastardly doings as the bodies and the laughs pile up before your eyes. Featuring all three surprise endings!!

programme.title: Fatal Attraction, (1987, Crime)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas plays Dan, a New York attorney who has a tryst with seductive Alex Forrest while his wife is away. Dan later shrugs off the affair as a mistake and considers it over. But Alex won't be ignored. Not now, not tomorrow, not ever.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee In Los Angeles, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Crocodile Dundee returns in this hilarious third installment of the beloved film series. After Mick's girlfriend, Sue, is assigned to the L.A. bureau of her father's newspaper, Mick, Sue and their son Mikey head to Hollywood.

programme.title: Gallipoli, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Two young men (Mel Gibson and Mark Lee) are brought together in the Australian army in 1915. They cross continents and great oceans, climb pyramids and walk through the ancient sands of Egypt to join their regiment at the fateful battle of Gallipoli.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)

programme.title: Deep Impact, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a couple of young astronomers discover an enormous comet on course to collide with Earth, the countdown to doomsday begins and the human race embarks on the fight for survival.

programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri's Weak Point!

programme.title: Luffy runs out of his Haki and has to buy some time - in the most peculiar way! Meanwhile the Big Mom Pirates mobilize their entire fleet to squelch the pirate threat, and the replacement cake nears completion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Another Crisis! Gear Four vs. Unstoppable Donuts!

programme.title: When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing himself to his enemies! Meanwhile, Luffy uses Brulee as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!

programme.title: Bege arrives on the scene, seemingly willing to risk it all to bring down the Big Mom Pirates in a blaze of glory, but of course he has a trick up his sleeve! Meanwhile, Luffy keeps on the move to regain his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Man's Way of Life! Bege and Luffy's Determination as Captains!

programme.title: Sanji and Bege get together and get off of Cacao Island successfully, but their plan is in jeopardy as Oven begins to boil the sea itself! As Chiffon and the others who are on the ship are cornered, a surprising savior comes in to fight Oven!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege's Getaway Battle!

programme.title: A vicious pincer attack bears down on the Straw Hats! Three fleets converge and try to squeeze the life from them! Daifuku himself take the lead! But Carrot draws on a deep power within and springs in to action under the light of the moon!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The much anticipated wedding cake is on its way, but there is a debate at the last minute! Shouldn't this opportunity be used to slip poison into Big Mom's meal to topple the Emperor of the Sea?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Break Through! The Straw Hat's Mighty Sea Battle!

programme.title: Luffy, through sheer force of will, can almost use his Haki to battle Katakuri! Meanwhile, the Sunny catches fire while the Straw Hats try to kick out Big Mom, but that's when Jimbei steps up to the plate and takes a swing at her!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally, They Clash! The Emperor of the Sea vs. the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Luffy tries to enhance his Haki to foresee Katakuri's next move, but Katakuri's attacks keep pulling him down!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dark King's Direct Precepts! The Battle Against Katakuri Turns Around!

programme.title: The cake is finally prepared and brought before Big Mom! With the end of her vicious rampage in sight, there is a chance for the Straw Hats to flee! Big Mom's crew is forced to decide who to attack! Meanwhile, Luffy grows ever closer to using his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally He Returns! Sanji, the Man Who'll Stop the Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: Hiding her presence, Flampe shoots her blowgun at Luffy to support her dear brother Katakuri. Meanwhile, Oven launches a dastardly plan to fence Luffy in - by destroying every mirror on the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Lurking in the Darkness! An Assassin Targeting Luffy!

programme.title: Katakuri notices his sister Flampe is sneakily providing poison needle back up in the shadows. Becoming enraged, he takes unexpected action that surprises everyone. Meanwhile, Smoothie increases her size and closes in on the Sunny.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Man's Determination! Katakuri's Deadly Big Fight!

programme.title: Luffy leans on his training to bring out the power of his Haki! Meanwhile, the children of Big Mom gather as a massive force, ready to smash Luffy and the Straw Hats. Their resentment at being embarrassed fuels their desire to get revenge!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Wake Up! The Color of Observation Able to Top the Strongest!

programme.title: Luffy and Katakuri are locked in a duel to end all duels! Their powers ensure that each blow could be the last! Luffy must rely on his training, let all his thoughts out, and keep pushing on! Meanwhile, Sanji is about to land at Cacao Island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fist of Divine Speed! Another Gear Four Application Activated!

programme.title: Luffy's dramatic battle finally draws to a close! But even if he is able to pull out victory in the last moment, can he remember the key to escaping the Mirrorworld?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally, It's Over! The Climax of the Intense Fight against Katakuri!

programme.title: Luffy emerges safely! And Pekoms' bravery ensures he and the Straw Hats have a fighting chance! But can they withstand the full force of the Big Mom Pirates? At the last moment - a surprise explodes onto the scene!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! The Iron-tight Entrapment of Luffy!

programme.title: Sanji tries his best to save himself and his captain, Luffy! But the arrival of Germa has complicated matters. Whose side do these powerful superhumans fight on? In the end, sisterly love will see Sanji saved!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pulling Back from the Brink! The Formidable Reinforcements – Germa!

programme.title: Luffy and Sanji are safe! But the critical moment approaches - the fate of Totto Land rests on the taste of the wedding cake! Will it be sweet release or bitter defeat? Meanwhile, a cunning pincer attack leaves the Straw Hats hopelessly trapped.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last Hope! The Sun Pirates Emerge!

programme.title: With the help of the Sun Pirates, the Straw Hats see their chance to escape! And the Sun Pirates bid farewell to their former captain. Mama finally tastes the Wedding Cake and the results are positively scrumptious!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Captivating Flavor! Sanji's Cake of Happiness!

programme.title: The Big Mom Pirates fooled! The Straw Hats have eluded their would-be tormentors with the help of the Sun Pirates! However, as the fleet of the Big Mom Pirates is still coming after them, Jimbei makes a crucial decision to help the Sunny to get away.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man of Humanity and Justice! Jimbei, a Desperate Massive Ocean Current!

programme.title: At a great cost of energy and life, the Straw Hats make it out of Totto Land. Left behind in their wake are allies and friends, and would-be lovers. As the sea opens before them, what price has been paid for their escape?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Parting Time! Pudding's Last Wish!

programme.title: Luffy's recent exploits make their way around the world! The reputation of this mighty pirate begins to grow as all eyes look towards the Straw Hats' next move! Also - German 66 leaves an artifact behind which excites the crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The World is Stunned! The Fifth Emperor of the Sea Emerges!

programme.title: As the royals make their way to the Reverie, the mighty Navy takes all precautions to make sure they don't fall prey to kidnappings! At the vanguard is Koby, who glimpses Luffy's exploits and remembers their shared past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! The Straw Hats' Sworn Allies Come Together!

programme.title: A vicious pirate group led by Pinkbeard who describes himself as one of Blackbeard's affiliates attacks a town in the Kingdom of Lulucia while their king and able-bodied soldiers have gone to the Reverie. And four bizarre individuals come to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sabo Goes into Action! All the Captains of the Revolutionary Army Appear!

programme.title: At New Marineford, Sakazuki, the new Admiral of the Fleet, hears the news about Luffy and recalls the tumultuous Paramount War that haunts the Navy! That game-changing war has repercussions that last into the present!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Going into Action! The Implacable New Admiral of the Fleet - Sakazuki!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees…
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vault maker Marukin Safe Company is forced into bankruptcy after Lupin cracks open their impenetrable safes. To test his own skills, Marukin's son challenges Lupin to open a safe he has designed…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: While trying to snag General Hatler's prize medallion, which contains a fifty-carat ruby, Lupin inadvertently reels in Hatler's biggest secret, his toupee! An enraged General Hatler orders Lupin and his gang to be killed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Upon returning to Japan, Goemon finds his master on the brink of death. Furthermore, Jinkuro, a fellow disciple, had stolen half of the scroll containing the Secret Arts of the Iga Ninja. Will Goemon be able to avenge his master?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are in a remote area pursing a mysterious treasure, when they save a woman being chased by hoodlums. The woman invites the two back to her sister's manor, which is full of beautiful women…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A mysterious woman who claims to be Fujiko's aunt, gives Lupin an ultimatum: Find Marshal Rommel's lost gold or die! First, Lupin must decipher the location of the gold, written in ancient hieroglyphs.
programme.sub-title: A Witch in the Fourth Dimension

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The great thief Nezumi-Kozou Jirokichi IV appears before Goemon and reveals that their ancestors competed in the first International Thieves Championship together, but were defeated by Lupin's grandfather, Arsène Lupin…
programme.sub-title: The Phantom Thief Rat Boy Appears

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The warden of an African prison is holding Fujiko captive. Lupin and his gang infiltrate the prison and attempt to break Fujiko out, but they become the target of the Iron Lizards, robotic devices developed to chase down fugitives!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Linda, a beautiful dancer, has stolen Jigen's heart and a vengeful Meyer has taken Fujiko hostage. Believing the women they love are in danger and unaware that Linda and Meyer are working together, Lupin and Jigen are set up to kill each other…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: According to legend, a stamp named the Cinderella Shadow is said to make its owner a princess. Lupin and his gang pull off the heist, but a girl name Alice who also wants the stamp tags along. Will the little girl get her royal wish?
programme.sub-title: Where did the Cinderella Stamp Go?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has sent a notice declaring he will steal all the cash from every bank in Paris. Detective Melon, the granddaughter of Inspector Garimard, is chosen to catch Lupin alongside Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has many secret techniques up his sleeve, and one of them is his Levitation Technique. In order to get their hands on this technique, a crime syndicate plots a dirty trick, where a fake Lupin tortures a man known as X8 and frames the real Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Inspector Zenigata get kidnapped and the two are forcibly conscripted into the Foreign Legion in Morocco. Lupin and Inspector Zenigata make a run for it, but not before they're shackled together at the neck.
programme.sub-title: The Wind in Morocco is Hot

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Beautiful Swedish twins, Latica and Anita, are engaged in a battle to the death over the Viking treasure map concealed on their backs. In disguise, Lupin learns the map's secret, but the map possesses an additional secret.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A hit has been ordered on Lupin and Puma, a formidable hitman who specializes in long-range attacks, is on his trail! Lupin takes his chances with a close range, one-on-one showdown against Puma, but the plan seemingly backfires and Lupin is shot…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Orion's Crown has been stolen and is up for grabs at a black-market auction. Lupin has his eyes on both the crown and the auction money, but first he must outsmart the other parties vying for the crown, including Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A two-thousand-year-old casket has been excavated. Inside the casket is Camilla, a beautiful woman in a near-death state, holding a golden statuette of the Virgin Mary. Lupin attempts to steal the golden statuette, but things don't go as planned…
programme.sub-title: Lupin Who Turned into a Vampire

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are attending a party in Africa, waiting for an opportunity to snatch a rare black pearl. However, their plan goes awry when a gang of gorillas crashes the party and steals the black pearl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Massive riches have been hidden inside Tsukikage Castle. Lupin and his gang must decipher a code to find out the whereabouts of this great treasure. Wii Lupin be able to locate the treasure before his rivals do?
programme.sub-title: Uncover the Secret of Tsukikage Castle

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen head to Mongolia in search of Genghis Khan's treasures. Meanwhile, Goemon is visiting his ancestor's grave to pay his respects when he encounters Fujiko, who is in search of Yoshitsune Minamoto's buried treasure.
programme.sub-title: The Hidden Gold of Genghis Khan

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO chief promises to erase Fujiko's criminal record in exchange for her cooperation in arresting Lupin. Up against an ego-bruised Inspector Zenigata and a determined Fujiko, have Lupin's heisting days come to an end?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen sneak on board a ship smuggling diamonds. However, what they find on board are several thousand chickens! Lupin and his gang infiltrate the Hong Kong smuggling boss's lair where diamonds are being illicitly sold…
programme.sub-title: Diamonds Disappeared Under the Sky of Hong Kong

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal a suitcase containing Costa Rican diamonds, but the contents turns out to be Inspector Zenigata. The real diamonds are being shipped to Puerto Rico inside a missile and Lupin must find out the precise launch time to intercept it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaguya, a beautiful woman, separately asks Lupin, Jigen and Goemon to gather the tears of the Yeti, a mermaid's scale, and the liver of a dragon so she can make a secret potion.
programme.sub-title: Search for the Treasure of Princess Kaguya

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Stealth, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award® Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A hit man must beat the top assassins in the world.

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: Set in 79 A.D., POMPEII tells the epic story of Milo, a slave turned invincible gladiator who finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, Cassia, the beautiful daughter of a wealthy merchant.

programme.title: Last Action Hero, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Action-adventure superstar Arnold Schwarzenegger bursts through the screen as a larger-than-life movie hero in this nonstop adventure from acclaimed director John McTiernan (Predator, Die Hard). Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: The Halliday Brand, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: A western about a young man's (Joseph Cotten) disillusionment with his father (Ward Bond), a corrupt sheriff. When his dad turns away from the lynching of his sister's lover, the boy rebels and his father declares him an 'outlaw.'

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Western)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: Angel Eyes, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: After meeting under extraordinary life-and-death circumstances, a Chicago police officer (Lopez) and a lost soul named Catch (Caviezel) fall in love. While uncovering the truth about Catch, she is forced to deal with the secrets of her own past. Rated-R

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: The Art of War, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

programme.title: The Art of War II: Betrayal, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Agent Neil Shaw returns in the no holds barred action adventure sequel. When Shaw is called out of retirement as a Hollywood film consultant by the murder of his long-time martial arts mentor, 'Mother.'

programme.title: The Art of War III: Retribution, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: When international diplomacy comes up short, extreme measures must be taken. In the newest installment of Art of War, Agent Neil Shaw is on a covert mission to stop North Korean terrorists from obtaining a nuclear bomb.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: Nick and Jake set out to handle a delicate situation; the Ranch prepares for a threat greater than any they've faced before.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Yoshiki Usui’s new store opens. Usagi and her friends head out to see the fashion show, along with Fish’s Eye, who is captivated by Usui's good looks.
programme.sub-title: We Love Fashion: The Stylish Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi spots Minako out on a date with a handsome man. To everyone's surprise, the boyfriend is different from the one Usagi saw earlier.
programme.sub-title: Storm of Love: Minako's Grand Two-Timing Plan

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: An old woman named Mayako lives alone in a mansion. Mayako is very distrustful of strangers, believing they are after her wealth and fortune.
programme.sub-title: The Secret Mansion: A Menu of Love for You

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reports of Pegasus attacking the town cause Usagi and the other Sailor Guardians to have doubts about whether Pegasus can be trusted or not.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Pegasus: The Four Guardians' Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying their summer vacation by the beach. Shingo is acting as their bodyguard—especially for Ami, whom he has a crush on.
programme.sub-title: Shining Summer Days: Ami Under the Sea-Breeze

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa see an ad for a free ballet lesson and sign up. As they practice, Fish’s Eye draws the class's attention with his dancing skills.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa meet a woman named Rubina who follows them. Rubina is a princess who snuck out to experience life outside of her royal duties.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls attend the school festival. Makoto is asked to dance by a handsome man, who is actually Tiger's Eye in disguise.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Fish's Eye goes after Mamoru. But Mamoru seems to show no interest in being with anyone besides Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Evil: The Trio's Last Chance

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruéis vikings vai à Grã-Bretanha com a intenção de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa náufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se até chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operação Zodíaco
programme.desc: Um homem procura o mundo para um conjunto de artefatos místicos - 12 cabeças de bronze dos animais do zodíaco chinês.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive é contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.

programme.title: Uma Questão de Fé
programme.desc: Uma garota cristã influenciada pelas aulas do professor se afasta da fé, seu pai tenta fazer algo a respeito.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Após uma missão, uma enfermeira do exército retorna à fazenda da sua avó em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e é envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: O Diário de Tati
programme.desc: A adolescente Tati conta, de forma divertida, todos os problemas de sua juventude ao seu diário. Desde ficar em recuperação em matemática até os esforços para conseguir fisgar Zeca, sua paixão atual.

programme.title: Hora de Recomeçar
programme.desc: Uma jovem problemática precisa decidir entre ter uma vida divertida e sem preocupações da cidade grande, ou uma vida rural sem frescuras e muito trabalho duro para descobrir quem ela realmente é.

programme.title: Os Dez Mandamentos
programme.desc: Moisés ouve a voz de Deus vinda de uma Acácia de Fogo, que o inspira a confrontar o faraó do Egito.

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Moises
programme.desc: O rei do Egito é avisado da profecia de que Messias chegará. Para evitar que o inimigo sobreviva, ele ordena que matem todos os bebês do sexo masculino.

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Eliseu
programme.desc: Elias está prestes a encerrar seu ministério como profeta em Israel. Eliseu que será seu sucessor, o acompanha em seus últimos passos.

programme.title: Dear Dumb Diary
programme.desc: Baseado na série de livros, de sucesso, ‘Querido Diário Otário’ de Jim Benton.

programme.title: Uma Questão de Fé
programme.desc: Uma garota cristã influenciada pelas aulas do professor se afasta da fé, seu pai tenta fazer algo a respeito.

programme.title: Deus da guerra
programme.desc: Deus da Guerra se passa no século XVI, na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang (Wenzhuo Zhao) conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Na época dos Três Reinos da China, Cao Cao vive entre táticas militares, amor e relação entre pai e filho.

programme.title: Sem Controle
programme.desc: A vida de um jovem vira de cabeça para baixo quando seus sonhos violentos começam a se confundir com a realidade.

programme.title: A Possessão de Mary
programme.desc: David (Gary Oldman) é um capitão de colarinho azul que luta para melhorar a vida de sua família. Estranhamente atraído por um navio abandonado que está em leilão, David impulsivamente compra o barco, acreditando que será o bilhete de sua família para a felicidade e a prosperidade. Mas logo depois que eles embarcam em sua jornada inaugural, eventos estranhos e assustadores começam a aterrorizar David e sua família, fazendo com que se voltem um contra o outro e duvidem de sua própria sanidade.

programme.title: Em Campo Minado
programme.desc: Em setembro de 2006 no Afeganistão, três jovens soldados britânicos são enviados para dispersar um bloqueio Talibã, mas ao passarem pelo leito de um rio, um dos patrulheiros pisa em uma mina, deixada pela ocupação russa 25 anos atrás. Seus colegas pedem ajuda para resgatar o rapaz, que pode morrer ou ficar gravemente ferido. Mas logo que o reforço chega, eles descobrem que estão cercados por minas e que qualquer movimento em falso pode ser fatal.

programme.title: No Rastro da Violência
programme.desc: Fascinada pelas raízes do comportamento violento, a psicóloga renomada Dra. Amanda Tyler tem a oportunidade de entrevistar e analisar Jackson Shea, prisioneiro do corredor da morte.

programme.title: Deus da guerra
programme.desc: Deus da Guerra se passa no século XVI, na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang (Wenzhuo Zhao) conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. programme.title: Aprisionados
programme.desc: Realizado em uma delegacia de polícia remota, um estranho misterioso toma conta das mentes e das almas de todos dentro.

programme.title: Baile de Formatura
programme.desc: Enquanto um grupo de adolescentes se prepara para o baile de formatura, eles não sabem que um assassino está em busca de vingança. Uma noite de celebração rapidamente se transforma em um terrível banho de sangue... e todos são suspeitos.

programme.title: Roubo a Máfia
programme.desc: Um casal especializado em roubar da máfia começa um trabalho tão grande que os torna alvos tanto da máfia quanto do FBI.

programme.title: A Última Fronteira
programme.desc: Miguel, um médico espanhol, coloca-se em perigo para prestar tratamento médico às vítimas de revoltas militares. Wren é porta-voz de uma organização que financia assistência médica a nações empobrecidas em todo o mundo. Eles se conhecem na Libéria, onde Wren fica imediatamente impressionado com a abnegação, a habilidade médica e o charme de Miguel. Ambos iniciam um romance tórrido, que devem aprender a combinar com seu importante trabalho.

programme.title: Risco Imediato
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de americanos que vive em Londres tem uma grande divida por justa causa. Uma manhã eles encontram que o inquilino do apartamento de baixo morre e deixa 200.000 em dinheiro. Tudo o que eles têm a fazer é pegar o dinheiro e todos os seus problemas seriam resolvidos. Então eles fazem, e desde ahi coisas muito ruins começam a acontecer para eles.

programme.title: Efeito Dominó
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1971 foi construído um túnel para dentro da caixa-forte de um banco na Baker Street, em Londres. De lá foram roubados diversos cofres de dinheiro e jóias, no valor de milhões de libras.

programme.title: Reféns do Mal
programme.desc: Coisas sinistras começam a acontecer com os sequestradores que estão mantendo um menino para resgate em uma cabana remota.

programme.title: Hacker: Todo Crime Tem Um Início
programme.desc: Um jovem imigrante chega ao Canadá e se envolve com uma organização criminosa online chamada Darkweb.

programme.title: Jogo de Xadrez
programme.desc: Mina foi parar atrás das grades após um crime de corrupção. Mas o mandante, o senador Franco, usa sua influência para mantê-la presa e abafar o caso.

programme.title: Federal
programme.desc: O Delegado Vital e o agente Dani estão à frente de uma operação do Comando de Operações Táticas da Polícia Federal do Brasil para capturar o playboy brasiliense Carlos Beque, envolvido com o tráfico internacional de cocaína.

programme.title: Um Santo Vizinho
programme.desc: Jovem cujos pais se divorciaram encontra um mentor no veterano de guerra misantrópico que mora ao lado.

programme.title: Terapia do Amor
programme.desc: Rafi, uma bela produtora de fotos de 37 anos se recuperando de um divórcio recente, conhece David, um belo pintor de 23 anos recém-saído da faculdade.

programme.title: Transpondo Barreiras
programme.desc: Após a morte da mãe de Vincent (com síndrome de Tourette) seu pai o interna numa clínica experimental.

programme.title: Quem é Morto Sempre Aparece
programme.desc: Para resolver seus problemas financeiros, um agente de viagens está de olho em um cadáver congelado, que por acaso está sendo procurado por dois assassinos.

programme.title: S.O.S Mulheres ao Mar 2
programme.desc: Adriana, uma escritora bem-sucedida, segue feliz em seu romance com André, que está prestes a lançar sua mais nova coleção de moda durante um cruzeiro pelo Caribe. Ao saber que a ex-noiva dele vai acompanhá-lo na viagem em busca de uma reconciliação, Adriana chama suas fiéis escudeiras Luzia e Dialinda para embarcar no navio com eles.

programme.title: O Caçador e o Livro Mágico
programme.desc: Um lendário caçador de demônios, interpretado por Jackie Chan, investiga o desaparecimento de jovens garotas de um vilarejo. Quando descobre que forças malignas estão sequestrando as meninas para se banquetearem com suas almas, ele parte para salvar a humanidade

programme.title: Americano
programme.desc: Chris McKinley conhece Adela, e o enigmático Riccardo, eles o incentivam a reconsiderar seus planos.

programme.title: Meet Bill
programme.desc: Um homem de meia-idade que está cansado de seu trabalho e tem de suportar a infidelidade de sua esposa aceita, com relutância, a tarefa de ser mentor de um adolescente rebelde.

programme.title: Vinho de Verão
programme.desc: Na mesma ideia de "Sob o Sol da Toscana", James largou o emprego e seguiu seu sonho, que o levou a Espanha.

programme.title: Encontrando o Amor em Nebraska
programme.desc: Kennedy Blaine, uma garota californiana, herda um rancho na pequena cidade de Valentine, em Nebraska. Antes de vender a propriedade, ela decide passar o verão no rancho e aprender mais sobre sua família.

programme.title: S.O.S. do Amor
programme.desc: Em um cruzeiro ao Caribe, Jenny está abandonada em uma praia com seu ídolo do rock and roll.

programme.title: O Último Vice-Rei
programme.desc: Em 1947, Lord Mountbatten assume o cargo de último vice-rei, encarregado de entregar a Índia de volta ao seu povo. Ele massa a viver no andar de cima na casa que era antes de governantes britânicos, enquanto 500 criados hindus, muçulmanos e sikh viviam no andar de baixo.

programme.desc: Após a morte de sua esposa grávida, Henry encontra-se perdido em uma vida centrada no trabalho.

programme.title: Preciso ser pai
programme.desc: Se os vinte anos são a época da diversão, então Jonah entende bem do assunto, até que ele recebe um diagnóstico de que ficará infértil em um mês. De repente, o garoto festeiro muda completamente suas prioridades. Ele tenta congelar o esperma, mas quando isso dá errado, só restam três semanas de fertilidade para Jonah.

programme.title: O Último Vice-Rei
programme.desc: Em 1947, Lord Mountbatten assume o cargo de último vice-rei, encarregado de entregar a Índia de volta ao seu povo. Ele massa a viver no andar de cima na casa que era antes de governantes britânicos, enquanto 500 criados hindus, muçulmanos e sikh viviam no andar de baixo.

programme.title: O Livro do Amor
programme.desc: Após a morte de sua esposa grávida, Henry encontra-se perdido em uma vida centrada no trabalho.

programme.title: Entre o Amor e a Fama
programme.desc: Uma estrela de reality show deixa Hollywood e se reencontra em uma comunidade Amish, em Nebraska, onde deve decidir entre permanecer em sua nova realidade ou retornar à antiga.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Para deter um assassino racista, Shaft precisa localizar as únicas testemunhas que podem colocá-lo atrás das grandes. O perigo só aumenta enquanto Shaft investiga.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, está imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que é procurado por lobisomens por razões desconhecidas.

programme.title: Penalidade Máxima
programme.desc: Danny Meehan (Vinnie Jones) é um verdadeiro ídolo do futebol inglês.Entretanto, Danny perde tudo o que conquistou em sua carreira pós ter sido acusado de manipular o resultado de um jogo.

programme.title: A Vinganca é Minha
programme.desc: Após o ataque a seu complexo, Kane enterra seus amigos e parte para vingar suas mortes. Monte uma nova equipe e siga o caminho através da fronteira para Vancouver.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz é um serial killer de Londres que está matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polícia duro, inflexível e politicamente incorreto, terão a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata.

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3
programme.desc: Frank Martin é obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agência de Proteção Ambiental da Ucrânia, de Marselha a Odessa, além de dois sacos de conteúdo suspeito.

programme.title: Desaparecidos
programme.desc: Alice Launey, uma especialista forense francesa ainda assombrada por seu passado, vem a Seul para apresentar seu trabalho. Ela conhecerá JinHo, um detetive que pede sua ajuda em um caso de assassinato.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Para deter um assassino racista, Shaft precisa localizar as únicas testemunhas que podem colocá-lo atrás das grandes. O perigo só aumenta enquanto Shaft investiga.

programme.title: Operação Retorno à Base
programme.desc: Depois de realizar uma proeza perigosa, Tae-hun é transferido para uma unidade aérea de combate. A ação intensifica-se à medida que as forças norte-coreanas se tornam uma ameaça e se desenrolam batalhas aéreas de alto risco.

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok
programme.desc: Joe é um assassino que está na Tailândia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos são inimigos de Surat, um chefão do crime local. Para não ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingança Explosiva
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev é um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experiências. Ao visitar sua família ele descobre que sua filha está casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.
